name: The Harvest (prototype)
description:
Ladies and lads this is a prototype created by me and my group member (Reuben Leon, Connor Water) -  (we recommend for you to play as 'Alucard' instead of Marya). Please give us as much feedback as you want! It would be much appreciated.

Storyline:

A spoiled vampire – child of the head Vampire – Count Dracula, continually causes trouble at home impacting the image of the supreme vampire family. Count Dracula and Lady Elizabeth decides to send the youngling to a small troubled town to be taught a lesson or two in the process of disciplining the protagonist into becoming a fine well-disciplined, future head of the family.
